general.name: mangaDRPall
general.short: The final summary FITS binary table for the MaNGA DRP
general.description: This is the final summary for the MaNGA Data Reduction Pipeline (DRP). It merges together information taken from mangacore, the repository containing all MaNGA metadata, and various header information taken from the output MaNGA cubes. It contains no actual spectra from MaNGA cubes, but all of the information required to find a given set of spectra. It can be used to search locally for galaxies matching a given set of selection criteria.

surveys.name: MaNGA
surveys.long: Mapping Nearby Galaxies at Apache Point Observatory
surveys.description: A wide-field optical spectroscopic IFU survey of extragalactic sources to study galaxy dynamics and kinematics

general.naming_convention: drpall-[drpver].fits, where [drpver]is the version of the MaNGA Data Reduction Pipeline (DRP) that generated this file.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

ifudesignwrongsize.description: The allocated IFU size if the intended IFU size was not available

nsa_field.description: SDSS field ID covering the target

nsa_run.description: SDSS run ID covering the target

nsa_camcol.name: nsa_camcol
nsa_camcol.description: SDSS camcol ID covering the catalog position

nsa_version.name: nsa_version
nsa_version.description: Version of NSA catalogue used to select these targets

nsa_nsaid.name: nsa_nsaid
nsa_nsaid.description: The NSAID field in the NSA catalogue referenced in nsa_version

nsa_nsaid_v1b.name: nsa_nsaid_v1b
nsa_nsaid_v1b.description: The NSAID of the target in the NSA_v1b_0_0_v2 catalogue (if applicable)

nsa_zdist.name: nsa_zdist
nsa_zdist.description: Distance estimate using peculiar velocity model of Willick et al. (1997); multiply by c/Ho for Mpc

nsa_sersic_absmag.name: nsa_sersic_absmag
nsa_sersic_absmag.description: Absolute magnitude estimates in rest-frame bands [FNugriz] from K-correction (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_absmag.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag
nsa_elpetro_absmag.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame bands [FNugriz], from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_amivar.name: nsa_elpetro_amivar
nsa_elpetro_amivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_elpetro_absmag in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_sersic_mass.name: nsa_sersic_mass
nsa_sersic_mass.description: Stellar mass from K-correction fit (use with caution) for Sersic fluxes (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_mass.name: nsa_elpetro_mass
nsa_elpetro_mass.description: Stellar mass from K-correction fit (use with caution) for elliptical Petrosian fluxes (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_ba.name: nsa_elpetro_ba
nsa_elpetro_ba.description: Axis ratio used for elliptical apertures (for this version, same as ba90)

nsa_elpetro_phi.name: nsa_elpetro_phi
nsa_elpetro_phi.description: Position angle (east of north) used for elliptical apertures (for this version, same as ba90)

nsa_extinction.name: nsa_extinction
nsa_extinction.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_elpetro_th50_r.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_r
nsa_elpetro_th50_r.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS r-band

nsa_petro_th50.name: nsa_petro_th50
nsa_petro_th50.description: Azimuthally averaged SDSS-style Petrosian 50% light radius (derived from r band)

nsa_petro_flux.name: nsa_petro_flux
nsa_petro_flux.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in bands [FNugriz] (using r-band aperture)

nsa_petro_flux_ivar.name: nsa_petro_flux_ivar
nsa_petro_flux_ivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_petro_flux in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_elpetro_flux.name: nsa_elpetro_flux
nsa_elpetro_flux.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in bands [FNugriz] (using r-band aperture)

nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar
nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_elpetro_flux in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_sersic_ba.name: nsa_sersic_ba
nsa_sersic_ba.description: Axis ratio b/a from two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band

nsa_sersic_n.name: nsa_sersic_n
nsa_sersic_n.description: Sersic index from two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band

nsa_sersic_phi.name: nsa_sersic_phi
nsa_sersic_phi.description: Angle (E of N) of major axis in two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band

nsa_sersic_th50.name: nsa_sersic_th50
nsa_sersic_th50.description: 50% light radius of two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit to r-band

nsa_sersic_flux.name: nsa_sersic_flux
nsa_sersic_flux.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in bands [FNugriz] (fit using r-band structural parameters)

nsa_sersic_flux_ivar.name: nsa_sersic_flux_ivar
nsa_sersic_flux_ivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_sersic_flux in bands [FNugriz]

manga_tileid.name: manga_tileid
manga_tileid.description: The ID of the tile to which this object has been allocated

ifutargetsize.name: ifutargetsize
ifutargetsize.description: The ideal IFU size for this object. The intended IFU size is equal to IFUTargetSize except if IFUTargetSize > 127 when it is 127, or < 19 when it is 19

ifudesignwrongsize.name: ifudesignwrongsize
ifudesignwrongsize.description: The allocated IFU size if the intended IFU size was not available

z.name: z
z.description: The targeting redshift (identical to nsa_z for those targets in the NSA Catalog. For others, it is the redshift provided by the Ancillary programs)

zmin.name: zmin
zmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary sample

zmax.name: zmax
zmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary sample

szmin.name: szmin
szmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Secondary sample

szmax.name: szmax
szmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Secondary sample

ezmin.name: ezmin
ezmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary+ sample

ezmax.name: ezmax
ezmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary+ sample

probs.name: probs
probs.description: The probability that a Secondary sample galaxy is included after down-sampling. For galaxies not in the Secondary sample PROBS is set to the mean down-sampling probability

pweight.name: pweight
pweight.description: The volume weight for the Primary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

psweight.name: psweight
psweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

psrweight.name: psrweight
psrweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

sweight.name: sweight
sweight.description: The volume weight for the full Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

srweight.name: srweight
srweight.description: The volume weight for the down-sampled Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

eweight.name: eweight
eweight.description: The volume weight for the Primary+ sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

esweight.name: esweight
esweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary+ and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

esrweight.name: esrweight
esrweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary+ and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

mngtarg1.description: Manga-target1 maskbit for galaxy target catalog

mngtarg2.name: mngtarg2
mngtarg2.description: Manga-target2 maskbit for galaxy target catalog

mngtarg3.name: mngtarg3
mngtarg3.description: Manga-target3 maskbit for galaxy target catalog

catidnum.name: catidnum
catidnum.description: Primary target input catalog (leading digits of mangaid)

plttarg.name: plttarg
plttarg.description: plateTarget reference file appropriate for this target

manga_tileid.name: manga_tileid
manga_tileid.description: The ID of the tile to which this object has been allocated

ifutargetsize.name: ifutargetsize
ifutargetsize.description: The ideal IFU size for this object. The intended IFU size is equal to IFUTargetSize except if IFUTargetSize > 127 when it is 127, or < 19 when it is 19

ifudesignwrongsize.name: ifudesignwrongsize
ifudesignwrongsize.description: The allocated IFU size if the intended IFU size was not available

z.name: z
z.description: The targeting redshift (identical to nsa_z for those targets in the NSA Catalog. For others, it is the redshift provided by the Ancillary programs)

zmin.name: zmin
zmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary sample

zmax.name: zmax
zmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary sample

szmin.name: szmin
szmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Secondary sample

szmax.name: szmax
szmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Secondary sample

ezmin.name: ezmin
ezmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary+ sample

ezmax.name: ezmax
ezmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary+ sample

probs.name: probs
probs.description: The probability that a Secondary sample galaxy is included after down-sampling. For galaxies not in the Secondary sample PROBS is set to the mean down-sampling probability

pweight.name: pweight
pweight.description: The volume weight for the Primary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

psweight.name: psweight
psweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

psrweight.name: psrweight
psrweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

sweight.name: sweight
sweight.description: The volume weight for the full Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

srweight.name: srweight
srweight.description: The volume weight for the down-sampled Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

eweight.name: eweight
eweight.description: The volume weight for the Primary+ sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

esweight.name: esweight
esweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary+ and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

esrweight.name: esrweight
esrweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary+ and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample.

nsa_field.name: nsa_field
nsa_field.description: SDSS field ID covering the target

nsa_run.name: nsa_run
nsa_run.description: SDSS run ID covering the target

nsa_camcol.name: nsa_camcol
nsa_camcol.description: SDSS camcol ID covering the catalog position

nsa_version.name: nsa_version
nsa_version.description: Version of NSA catalogue used to select these targets

nsa_nsaid.name: nsa_nsaid
nsa_nsaid.description: The NSAID field in the NSA catalogue referenced in nsa_version

nsa_nsaid_v1b.name: nsa_nsaid_v1b
nsa_nsaid_v1b.description: The NSAID of the target in the NSA_v1b_0_0_v2 catalogue (if applicable)

nsa_zdist.name: nsa_zdist
nsa_zdist.description: Distance estimate using peculiar velocity model of Willick et al. (1997); multiply by c/Ho for Mpc

nsa_sersic_absmag.name: nsa_sersic_absmag
nsa_sersic_absmag.description: Absolute magnitude estimates in rest-frame bands [FNugriz] from K-correction (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_absmag.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag
nsa_elpetro_absmag.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame bands [FNugriz], from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_amivar.name: nsa_elpetro_amivar
nsa_elpetro_amivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_elpetro_absmag in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_sersic_mass.name: nsa_sersic_mass
nsa_sersic_mass.description: Stellar mass from K-correction fit (use with caution) for Sersic fluxes (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_mass.name: nsa_elpetro_mass
nsa_elpetro_mass.description: Stellar mass from K-correction fit (use with caution) for elliptical Petrosian fluxes (Ωm=0.3, ΩΛ=0.7, h=1)

nsa_elpetro_ba.name: nsa_elpetro_ba
nsa_elpetro_ba.description: Axis ratio used for elliptical apertures (for this version, same as ba90)

nsa_elpetro_phi.name: nsa_elpetro_phi
nsa_elpetro_phi.description: Position angle (east of north) used for elliptical apertures (for this version, same as ba90)

nsa_extinction.name: nsa_extinction
nsa_extinction.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_elpetro_th50_r.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_r
nsa_elpetro_th50_r.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS r-band

nsa_petro_th50.name: nsa_petro_th50
nsa_petro_th50.description: Azimuthally averaged SDSS-style Petrosian 50% light radius (derived from r band)

nsa_petro_flux.name: nsa_petro_flux
nsa_petro_flux.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in bands [FNugriz] (using r-band aperture)

nsa_petro_flux_ivar.name: nsa_petro_flux_ivar
nsa_petro_flux_ivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_petro_flux in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_elpetro_flux.name: nsa_elpetro_flux
nsa_elpetro_flux.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in bands [FNugriz] (using r-band aperture)

nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar
nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_elpetro_flux in bands [FNugriz]

nsa_sersic_ba.name: nsa_sersic_ba
nsa_sersic_ba.description: Axis ratio b/a from two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band

nsa_sersic_n.name: nsa_sersic_n
nsa_sersic_n.description: Sersic index from two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band

nsa_sersic_phi.name: nsa_sersic_phi
nsa_sersic_phi.description: Angle (E of N) of major axis in two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band

nsa_sersic_th50.name: nsa_sersic_th50
nsa_sersic_th50.description: 50% light radius of two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit to r-band

nsa_sersic_flux.name: nsa_sersic_flux
nsa_sersic_flux.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in bands [FNugriz] (fit using r-band structural parameters)

nsa_sersic_flux_ivar.name: nsa_sersic_flux_ivar
nsa_sersic_flux_ivar.description: Inverse variance of nsa_sersic_flux in bands [FNugriz]
